text: Bachia trinitatis, the Trinidad bachia or Trinidad worm lizard, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Trinidad and Tobago. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles of Trinidad and Tobago Category:Endemic fauna of Trinidad and Tobago Category:Reptiles described in 1914 Category:Taxa named by Thomas Barbour
title: Bachia trinitatis
